findings.title: C01. Data Consistency
findings.description: It is recommended to perform a validity check on the SwapDescription.srcToken and SwapDescription.dstToken values within both the _deposit and _redeem functions to prevent potential security breaches.

findings.title: H02. Non-Finalized Code: FIXME Comments
findings.description: The code contains FIXME comments indicating non-finalized code, which may lead to additional changes in the future.

findings.title: H03. Invalid Calculations
findings.description: sharesToToken1 function uses incorrect logic to handle cases when shares parameter is bigger than supply, resulting in same result for any input parameter less than totalSupply.
